divs: Sighting Detailsthey have been tormenting me for months no one would believe the stories i could tell except for the guy in SLC Utah who has also been posting warnings. At night they look like a star that moves and flashes and disappears in the day they appear as balloons or a light in the sky. Don't keep looking for them don't make the same mistake i did.
Summary: canoga park don't look for them they are not very nice
